DOCNAME: CASE OF GALINA KUZNETSOVA v. RUSSIA
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LANGUAGE in LOC .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE ( ORG ) partly granted the applicant 's tort action against a municipal housing maintenance company of LOC and awarded her MONEY ( RUB ) as compensation for pecuniary damage and RUB CARDINAL as compensation for non - pecuniary damage . The district court also ordered that the housing authority should repair the roof , the heating system and the water - pipes in the applicant 's house .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG amended the judgment on appeal , increased the amount of compensation for pecuniary damage by RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL and upheld the remainder of the judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE the respondent company was declared insolvent and the insolvency procedure started .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG index - linked the award of DATE and held that the respondent company was to pay the applicant RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . The judgment became final DATE .

CARDINAL . NORP By letter of CARDINAL DATE an insolvency manager of the housing maintenance company had notified the applicant that the respondent company had been declared insolvent and that the debtor was to be released from claims that were unsatisfied in the insolvency proceedings , since there was a lack of assets . Accordingly , the applicant 's claims could not be satisfied . The case materials do not contain further information on the insolvency proceedings .
CARDINAL . The judgments of CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE have not been enforced to date .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant sued ORG and ORG of ORG for compensation for damage caused by the bailiffs ' failure to enforce the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partly granted her action . The court found that the bailiff had failed to send the enforcement documents to the applicant in time and was inactive in obtaining the execution of the judgment . The court awarded the applicant RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL against the local department of ORG as compensation for non - pecuniary damage and RUB MONEY as compensation for expenses related to the enforcement and court proceedings against the regional department of ORG . The district court also held that the respondents were not under an obligation to pay the applicant RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL because the bankruptcy proceedings in respect of the municipal company were pending and the applicant had been included in the register of the housing maintenance company creditors ' claims . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE of the court award had been paid to the applicant by the respondent authority .

CARDINAL . According to the Government , at some point the bailiff was dismissed on account of her failure to ensure timely enforcement of the judgments in the applicant 's favour . On DATE ORG held that the bailiff should repay RUB CARDINAL of damages to the authorities .
